name: Select
purpose: Allow the user to choose a single value from a known, finite list of options.
useWhen: User can recognize the correct option without searching
Only one option may be selected
rules: Selection is made from a closed list
User does not type to filter options
Only one value may be selected
doNotUseWhen: User needs to search or filter to find an option
Multiple values may be selected (use Combobox)
aiHints: Prefer Select over Combobox when options are short and recognizable
Do not use Select as a searchable control
If users must type, use Combobox
